https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ydtGc9GXq0XGKozNOs0kmzfuuBm.jpg Chuck Nolan, a top international manager for FedEx, and Kelly, a Ph.D. student, are in love and heading towards marriage. Then Chuck's plane to Malaysia crashes at sea during a terrible storm. He's the only survivor, and finds himself marooned on a desolate island. With no way to escape, Chuck must find ways to survive in his new home. Cast Away
